title: The Asset Allocator: Why We Diversify
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Protecting against the downside is the first step in investing. This podcast (4:16) argues that advisors should encourage clients to reduce risk and aspire to steady returns as the best means of attaining long-term solvency and stability in their financial lives. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
